preqs: DGN1001, or CDS1001, or IDN1001, or by permission

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DGN1001} or  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CDS1001} or  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {IDN1001})

description: Introduces the fundamental principles of typography. Students will utilise type both as a communicative and expressive tool. Contemporary and historical methods of typographic production, from print to digital media are examined. Students are encouraged to critically analyse and question the relationships between type and meaning, type and language. Emphasis is placed upon the acquisition of skills and knowledge.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
